reference.title: Input data file formats
reference.shortdesc: Specifications for the airports and flights input files, including whitespace normalization rules.

section.title: airports.txt
section.p: Whitespace around each field may include spaces or tabs and must be removed during load.
Notes: Airport codes are unique 3-letter identifiers and are used as keys in allAirports.

section.title: flights.txt
section.p: Whitespace around each field may include spaces or tabs and must be removed during load.
Constraints: ORIGIN_CODE and DEST_CODE must exist in allAirports.
Indexing: Flights are grouped in allFlights under their ORIGIN_CODE key.
